entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
